message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $20000 is outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $17000 to make this work. Let me know if you're able to meet me halfway on this.
Alice, I understand your position. However, $17000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12000. Let's meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14000. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows me to meet my minimum requirements while ensuring you get a good deal. What do you think?
